pullRequest.title: HBASE-23999 [flakey test] TestTableOutputFormatConnectionExhaust
pullRequest.bodyText: Do not overwrite the hbase-site.xml which is being used by other tests.

nodes.bodyText: @wchevreuil can you comment as to why this test needed to write out it's hbase-site.xml? Presumably it was done for a reason and it's not enough to simply not write it out.
